name: Symantec Cloud Secure Web Gateway
description: Symantec Cloud Secure Web Gateway (SWG) is a cutting-edge cybersecurity solution designed to provide robust protection and control over internet traffic within organizations. Leveraging advanced threat intelligence, real-time content analysis, and secure web access policies, Symantec Cloud SWG ensures a secure and compliant online environment for users.
author: Cortex XSOAR
